resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/44155</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>44155</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:clao_es_20070119_2_0020109</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>clao_es_20070119_2_0020109</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Busca palabras en griego</string>
            <string language="en">Find words in Greek</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entdeckungwörter auf Griechen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mots de trouvaille dans le Grec</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Palavras do achado no grego</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parole del ritrovamento in greco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βρείτε τις λέξεις στα ελληνικά</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se trata de una sopa de letras en la que el alumno debe pulsar sobre las letras que forman una palabra en el orden adecuado. Se trata de palabras griegas 'transparentes' para un hablante de castellano como 'átomos'.</string>
            <string language="en">This activity lets the students click on letters in a word search in the right order to form a Greek word. The words are easily understandable for Spanish speakers ('atomos', for example)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">griego</string>
            <string language="en">Greek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">palabras</string>
            <string language="en">Words</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Aktivität läßt die Kursteilnehmer 
Zeichen in einer Wortsuche in der rechten Ordnung an klicken, um ein 
griechisches Wort zu bilden. Die Wörter sind leicht für 
spanische Lautsprecher verständlich (' atomos', z.B.)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette activité laisse les étudiants 
cliquer sur des lettres dans une recherche de mot dans la 
bonne commande pour former un mot grec. Les mots sont facilement
compréhensibles pour les orateurs espagnols ('atomos, par exemple)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta atividade deixa os estudantes estalar sobre 
letras em uma busca da palavra na ordem direita para dar forma a uma 
palavra grega. As palavras são fàcilmente compreensíveis para
os altofalantes espanhóis (' atomos', para o exemplo)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa attività lascia gli allievi scattare 
sopra le lettere in una ricerca di parola nel giusto ordine per 
formare una parola greca. Le parole sono facilmente 
comprensibili per gli altoparlanti spagnoli ('atomos, per esempio)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η δραστηριότητα αφήνει τους σπουδαστές να 
χτυπήσουν στις επιστολές σε μια αναζήτηση λέξης στη σωστή 
κατάταξη να διαμορφωθεί μια ελληνική λέξη. Οι λέξεις είναι
εύκολα κατανοητές για τους ισπανικούς ομιλητές ("atomos, 
παραδείγματος χάριν)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Griechisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wörter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Grec</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mots</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Grego</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Palavras</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Greco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελληνικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λέξεις</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
